STISD Curbside Meals to be Served Tuesday and Thursday During Week of April 13

strong.span: lcome to South Texas Independent School District

p.span:
South Texas Independent School District (STISD) serves junior high and high school students who live along the southernmost tip of Texas, the region known as the Rio Grande Valley. The district stretches over three counties - Cameron, Hidalgo and Willacy - and overlaps 28 other school districts, an area of 3,643 miles. Read more...
2018-2019 District & Campus Performance Report: Click here for ratings

a.title: Request for Proposals and Request for Qualifications
STISD Curbside Meals to be Served Tuesday and Thursday During Week of April 13

div.a: STISD Curbside Meals to be Served Tuesday and Thursday During Week of April 13
div.div: STISD is modifying its schedule of serving curbside meals to the community during the week of April 13 only to Tuesday and Thursday.
div.a: Read More about STISD Curbside Meals to be Served Tuesday and Thursday During Week of April 13

a.title: Superintendent Announces District Adjustments in Light of Developments

div.a: Superintendent Announces District Adjustments in Light of Developments
div.div: Superintendent Dr. Lara announces that schools will remain closed until further notice and adjustment being made district wide.
div.a: Read More about Superintendent Announces District Adjustments in Light of Developments

a.title: STISD Streamlining Process to Serve Meals for Week through Monday and Wednesday Pick-Up Only

div.a: STISD Streamlining Process to Serve Meals for Week through Monday and Wednesday Pick-Up Only
div.div: Beginning March 30, STISD will continue serving breakfast and lunch for the week, but will do so through pick-up on Mondays and Wednesdays only.
div.a: Read More about STISD Streamlining Process to Serve Meals for Week through Monday and Wednesday Pick-Up Only

div.p:
Out of an abundance of caution, STISD has moved into Level 3 of its response plan in relation to Coronavirus. As such, STISD will suspend all normal school operations and close all STISD schools from March 23rd – April 8th. Read more here.
----------------------------------------
Enrollment for the 2020-2021 school year begins April 4 at 9 a.m. for all campuses.
In the meantime, prospective families and students can visit our STISD SchoolMint enrollment page to create their family and student profiles in preparation for Enrollment Day. Click here to access the STISD SchoolMint page.
For additional information regarding enrollment, visit: http://www.stisd.net/enroll.
